channel.title: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?
channel.description: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?? :) = = = = = = = = = = :D :D Lets say the exp per hit is 300 exp per hit and how much is put in hp exp per 1 hit

item.title: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?
item.dc:creator: @mike121333 mike121333

dude where do i co from where i sowed? i want to fight but the only thing i can change is the cb lvl and the examine

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?

item.title: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

Alright, sorry to say to everyone else here but this is how it goes. Go into Client.java And Do ‘Ctrl’ and ‘F’ And a locater will be found. After in what you want to find will be called ‘Accurate.’ Now, After finding it, Click next a few times, until you see something like this.

::

inCombat();
if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
} else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
} else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
} else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

Now, That is what you want.

When you see your number, in this case the '#'s That is what you want to change your EXP to. Say the “#” is at 700EXP each Hit. Change it to 1000EXP each hit.

NOTE: WARNING:: YOUR SERVER MAY NOT BE THE SAME AS MINE, I’M SHOWING YOU THE WAY I KNOW.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change my HP exp per 1 hit?
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

[quote=“slevins, post:12, topic:247938”]I dont know if this helps but if u want to change the hp on the chaos element,
go into you npc.cfg, search for the chaos ele, and change the second hand column number

mine for example ~~ npc = 3200 Chaos_Elemental 305 960

305 - combat lvl
960 - hitpoints lvl

You need to change the hp number to w/e you want it to

hope this helped
.: slevins :.[/quote]

he dosn’t want to change monsters hp, he wants to change the hp xp per hit…

Read full topic
